    net.minecraft.inventory.container.IContainerProvider, net.minecraft.inventory.container.INamedContainerProvider, net.minecraft.tileentity.ITickableTileEntity, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilitySerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundNBT>, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeTileEntity, net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundNBT>, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.IDirtyMarkListener, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTProvider, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity.ITickingTile, IUpgradable<TileSpiritFurnace,org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable.MutableDouble>

    public class TileSpiritFurnace
extends TileWorking<TileSpiritFurnace,org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable.MutableDouble>
implements net.minecraft.inventory.container.INamedContainerProvider
    A furnace that is able to cook spirits for their inner entity drops.

                                   boolean valid,
                                   net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos originCorner)
        Callback for when a structure has been detected for a spirit furnace block.

        world - The world.
        location - The location of one block of the structure.
        size - The size of the structure.
